about_the_game:
A set that includes additional events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV" and the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

▼Added events
"Prodigy of Tianshui", "Jiang Wei Swears Fealty", "Wang Lang's Outrage", "Battle of Jieting", and "Mournful Execution"

Overview:
The events depict Zhuge Liang's northern campaign, one which he had started in order to fulfill the wishes of late Liu Bei. During the events, Zhuge Liang meets Jiang Wei, the prodigy of Tianshui, takes part in a debate with Wang Lang, battles over Jieting, the vital ground for the campaign, and more.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 Display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Display recommended
